Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
# Load IIS module:
Import-Module WebAdministration

# Get AppPool Name
$appPoolName = $OctopusParameters['appPoolName']

Write-Output "Starting IIS app pool $appPoolName"
Start-WebAppPool $appPoolName

Parameters.Name: AppPoolName
Parameters.Label: Application pool name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the application pool in IIS.
